title: atlas_v3 blows up when kp_velocity > 0 commanded for ankles

content.raw:
I have experienced the new model (atlas_v3_sandia_hands) blowing up if I set any of the ankle joints kp_velocity > 0 in the AtlasCommand message.  On the old model, I had this set to 5.0 for the ankles without issue.

The problem can be replicated just using the rostopic pub commands in the attached files

The robot is stable if I set all the kp_velocities = 1 except for the ankle, as in ankle_kpvel_zero.txt.

The robot will blow up if I set all the kp_velocities = 1 including the ankle, as in ankle_kpvel_one.txt
